item.title: About
item.description: I am a research engineer at DSO National Laboratories, Singapore. I am currently visiting at the Natural Language Processing Group at CSAIL, MIT under Prof. Regina Barzilay. I received a B.Sc (First Class Honours) from National University of Singapore in 2015 where I majored in Statistics & Applied Probability, with a specialization in business and finance statistics. I am currently working on improving automated fact-checking. Previously, I have worked on projects that involved using correlated Gaussian Processes for heat modelling and online incremental clustering techniques for entity resolution.

item.title: Projects
item.description: Be Calculative A simple calculator app to compare interests across three major banks in Singapore - DBS, OCBC and POSB
